entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sarnia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:21 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sarnia Chris Hadfield Airport 11:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -0.9°C
Pressure: 102.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -6.4°C
Wind: SW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of snow late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming north 20 in the morning. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
